_description: Fragment of verse — fragments of one couplet

CamTCC1450.Note:
Rigg (1968)
XRigg,  A. George. 
             Glastonbury Miscellany of the Fifteenth Century.
         Oxford, 1968, 145, describes as, ‘damaged and
                    indecipherable note, perhaps a verse couplet: most of the page is lost’;
                    preceded by Latin, perhaps a Latin version of the same, ‘[ ]de Requer[ ] /
                    [ ] demone deterior[ ]’.
